Nixism Web Hosting
where clients matter

Nixism knows, trying to find a reliable web hosting provider is very hard. In fact it is even harder to find a reliable VPS provider. We have been offering affordable and reliable hosting for quite sometime now. We understand that all of our clients have different needs, that's why we listened and are launching our own line of VPS Servers. Our service is not only stable, secure, and fast, but we have our highly skilled staff awaiting any question you have for them.

Promotional Plan #1: Only $8.99 a month, packed with 256MB Guaranteed RAM and 512MB Burstable RAM. 15GB Disk Space and 200GB Bandwidth. Limited Stock! Get started today!

----------------------------
Frequently Asked Question's
----------------------------
Q: How long does activation take?
A: Depending on the time of the day, activation can be as short as 20 mins but it can also be as long as 24 hours. Activation wouldn't be any longer than 24 hours.

Q: What payment methods are accepted?
A: At the moment, we currently only support PayPal and Moneybookers to process payments, and we use PayPal to process credit card payments.

Q: Where can I find your Terms of Service?
A: Our terms of service can be found by going here: http://www.nixism.com/servers/tos/

Q: Where are your servers located?
A: Our servers are located in Los Angles, California.

Q: Do you have any other VPS plans?
A: Yes, we have 4 other VPS plans you can choose from, and we also sell dedicated servers. Please check out this page for more information: http://nixism.com/servers/

Q: Are your VPS's managed?
A: No, all of our VPS's are un-managed. We do not offer any management what-so-ever.

Q: Is there a VPS Control Panel?
A: Not, at the moment but there will be one VERY soon(2-3 weeks); You can still control your VPS using SSH.
----------------------------------------------------------

Thanks for considering Nixism!
